title: AlymWehrli
author: AlymWehrli
created_time: August 21, 2023, 05:56:08 AMLast edit: August 24, 2023, 04:23:07 AM by AlymWehrli
content: We are a micronation.Libertarianism was the idea that originated decentralized systems, it is clear that in a government it is impossible to decentralize everything because for a society to function it is necessary to have rules of conduct and morals. There are many micronations that own territory in the world, but none of them have really created a true monetary and passport issuing system for real use.Soon we will post more information and curiosities about the country and nation, this was a brief introduction so that you can understand what it is about.We sent a letter to the UN for integration and recognition.Monetary system | CENTRAL BANKThe currency is GNEcoin (GNE) Decentralized, it can be exchanged for paper money, the paper money has security and standardization and is linked to a wallet with a certain amount of GNE, linked to the number of a given wallet for quantity control. Only 100 million units can be issued, of which 98 million were pre-mined for the government and nation under central bank ownership. Paper money will only be issued in that amount and when a unit of paper money needs to be destroyed, we will issue a new one to replace it. A total of 8 000 000 GNE are available for mining.In the future it will be possible to exchange GNE for the GNEusd Token and it can be exchanged or converted into USDT or USD, we are also connecting BitGne or BitcoinGne to the system that serves as a reserve or treasury, where it can be exchanged or converted into BTC Bitcoin.This is a brief introduction to the system, initially we participate in mining, buying and selling, soon we will give more details and information.https://micronations.wiki/https://www.gnegov.org/wallets: https://github.com/GNEgov/GNEcoin/https://twitter.com/GNEgovMy name is Alym and I have several other small projects that were created as a small part of GNE and are important steps towards what will come in the future. It's part of a well-crafted strategy.

It's part of a well-crafted strategy." This is just ridiculous, "I have several other small projects". No you don't you have several scams going to see if anyone will pick it up and you can profit from it. You are in all of them, it's the link between all, don't come with the read articles, everyone can do an article and yours are full of bullshit. You and your projects are a scam for the community.And btw on BTCP Discord you and "your friend" told that you weren't connected. So if they are all shares then you lied and you are indeed the scam leader.
